Package de.awi.floenavigation.services Description

This package contains the essential and crucial services that runs on background for the proper functioning of the app. These services are enabled from the MainActivity. These services run through out the lifetime of the app. However if these services gets disabled, it gets restarted when the user/admin navigates to the MainActivity.

GPS_Service - This service runs periodically and updates the app with gps location. AlphaCalculationService - This service runs periodically to calculate alpha angle to determine the position of mobile station. AngleCalculationService - This service periodically calculates angle beta. It calculates beta angle w.r.t to all the fixed stations, and stores the average beta value in the database. PredictionService - It predicts future positions of all the fixed stations based on received coordinates, SOG and COG at fixed intervals. ValidationService - It handles the comparison between predicted coordinates and the received coordinates and based on certain threshold values, notifies whether the sea ice floe has broken off.
